name: Tooth Fairy Brush & Care 2019
description:
The tooth fairy queen has assignments to complete, so before leaving home, you will need to help her to choose the perfect clothes for this healthy habits adventure. Brush her teeth and her hair, wash her face and use some makeup. Now she is ready to explore this fantasy children world! Unleash your creativity with many educative activities! Progress through all the levels of this healthy habits game!

Start learning healthy habits while you play the minigames of the Tooth Fairy Queen! Learn how to brush your teeth and discover a lot of surprises in this fairyland adventure game for kids! Play now!

Features:
- Wonderful Tooth Fairy Queen Adventure!
- Minigames for healthy kids!
- Educational activities to unleash the children creativity!
- Take pictures of your achievements and share them with your friends!

Start having fun now with these healthy habits games and learn all the secrets hidden in the tooth fairy queen world! Help the queen to collect the baby teeth! What are you waiting for? Play now!
